## AuthErrorMessage variable

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use AuthErrorCodes instead
> 

AuthErrorMessage class containing string constants used by error codes and messages.

**Signature:**

```typescript
AuthErrorMessage: {
    unexpectedError: {
        code: string;
        desc: string;
    };
    postRequestFailed: {
        code: string;
        desc: string;
    };
}
```
